TopicTitle: Orbit through an Mun Arch - Asteroid Edition!

Articles.Content:
The objektive of this mission was to throw an asteroid through a Mun Arch, and nothing else. The pusher vessel had to go around it because Jeb said so. The new Mun terrain makes this kind of difficult, but i found an Arch in a mostly flat region, with only a crater rim several kilometers south posing as an additional obstacle

Bam!

Next mission: repeat that with a bigger asteroid. These archs are huge!
Its like soccer, only with massive, million-ton space rocks and a state-of-the-art 94-Krillion-dollar Space ship.

Nicely done! It's particularly impressive that you were able to pick it up again on the far side.

Now, for your next trick, you need to figure a way to play croquet with it
This has to be an Only in Kerbal Space Program moment.
